string_table.name: pxabnsnfns10111101101
string_table.string: Closed captions. Press the spacebar to toggle captions on and off.
Skip Navigation. Hit enter to return to the slide.

slidelink.displaytext: We need to write a paper
Can you ever use outside sources?

resource_data.description: Help with Citations & Academic Honesty

slidetranscripts.slidetranscript:
<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="You know plagiarism is wrong, so how can you use someone else’s idea in your paper without plagiarizing?
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="The first thing you need to do is identify key information about the source. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="Identify the TITLE of the source, WHO wrote the idea you want to use, WHEN they wrote it, WHERE the information is located.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="You need to keep track of this information so that you and others can find your original source after reading the information in your paper. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="Let’s take a look at an example.
" /> </Block> <Block /> </Content> </Document>
